sentences.english: A cheerful sunlight penetrated the freshly unfolded and luminous leaves.
sentences.chinese: 一道歡快的陽光正穿過那些通明透亮的新發的樹葉。

sentences.english: This is the sheet jelly we made by our equipment. Come and taste it!
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡喫那家粉房做出來的粉皮，晶瑩透亮又筋道。

sentences.english: The wine is clear and bright crimson dress, splash dark purple halo.
sentences.chinese: 深紅色清澈而透亮的酒裙，閃現暗紫色光暈。

sentences.english: And there was no bright line found in the CT expression.
sentences.chinese: CT掃描在螺釘周圍也未發現透亮線出現。

sentences.english: The outlines of their faces are black lines, which are clear on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 面容輪廓線着黑色，於幕前觀看十分清晰透亮。

sentences.english: The salt there has not been processed yet. The grains looked quite rough, neither white nor crystal.
sentences.chinese: 這些鹽還沒有經過加工，顆粒很粗，不白也不透亮。

sentences.english: Pen and ink offers strong, intense color combined with a translucent effect.
sentences.chinese: 強鋼筆畫的提議，強烈的顏色與一個透亮作用結合了。

sentences.english: Its red mouth was slightly open, its big eye was wide and glassy-bright.
sentences.chinese: 它那紅色的嘴微微張開，大大的圓眼睛，晶瑩透亮。

sentences.english: But shiny furwas the least of its benefits.
sentences.chinese: 透亮的皮毛僅僅是運動帶來的好處中最小的一種。

sentences.english: Let skin appear pure white, bright and moving charm.
sentences.chinese: 讓肌膚煥發淨白透亮迷人神采。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
pure and limpid/(of a person) quick-witted
variant of 透徹|透彻[tou4 che4]
